title: Mammoth JSON
description: A 3D scene for use in the Mammoth engine

meta.description: Metadata associated with the file / scene

blender.description: What version of Blender produced the file

file.description: A sanitized version of the source file for this

version.description: The version of Mammoth 3D file this is / was generated by

cameras.description: The camera data for all cameras in the scene

lights.description: The light data for all lights in the scene

materials.description: The material data for all renderable objects in the scene

meshes.description: The mesh data for all renderable objects in the scene

objects.description: A list of all objects / nodes in the scene
